phrases: Open your mind.
Open your mind.
Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
Miss...
I think you have had enough.
Oh, you be quiet!
If you have time to lecture your customer, why do not you just hit me again!
Vodka, Sprodka!
I will take it straight!
Ever since that girl showed up, I have been stripped of my title as campus queen.
Forced to spend my nights drowning my sorrows alone...
Why, oh why did this have to happen to me?
Everything that is happened...
Excuse me, miss... are you all right?
Ah!
Choosing Between the Goddess and the Queen?
Damn, my head hurts!
I must have had too much to drink last night...
What did you do to me while I slept?
Just hold on a minute!
What did you do to me while I slept?
You passed out, and I am the one who brought you home!
You got me falling-down drunk and did this and that to me, did not you?
Do not get the wrong idea!
I am a woman!
Ugh!
I am not into that kind of thing, either!
Listen, you...
Belldandy's a thorn in your side, is not she?
Belldandy?
You heard me.
Just sign a contract with me, and I will help you banish Belldandy...
Did you say Belldandy?
So what are we going to do with this now?
You can bet Marller will be back for it.
You mean that demon's still around?
Yes, because this CD is a hindrance to Marller...
A hindrance to her?
Yes.
A hindrance to her?
But as long as it is in our hands, it will not be easy for her to make a move.
Why do not we just seal her?
That is a good idea!
Thanks to that demon, I got turned into a scooter...
I am the one who made you drink the potion, and rode you all over the city.
Oh, but I did not mean...
But if I did not get turned back, it would have been such a drag.
I do not mind being a motorcycle, but not a scooter!
I will never let her do such a thing!
Even if I have to go head-to-head with Marller, I am going to protect you, Keiichi.
But if we do seal her, Marller will have to wander through the Dark Realm again.
I would rather not go that far, if it is at all possible.
All right, then I will hold onto this for you.
Just worry about Keiichi, and nothing else.
Urd...
I am sure Marller does not want to be sent back to a place like that, either.
That is true, but...
Now that we have settled things, why do not you two go for a walk?
Brooding over things in the house will not get you anywhere, you know!
Wait a minute!
Urd!
Alrighty, have a good time now!
Really!
I do not believe Urd!
Well, we might as well go out, do not you think?
All right!
There they go.
Even so... that Marller... can I really trust her?
That is right.
If you grant my wish, I will help you to banish Belldandy.
Help, did you say?
Fine.
So what is this wish of yours?
If you have money in mind, I will pay you whatever you ask for.
I have no use for money.
Do not tell me you want to sleep with me!
I have no use for money.
I told you, I am a woman!
Remember?
Then what is it that you want?
It is quite simple, really.
At least, that is what she said at the time...
But even if this ends in failure, it will not really affect me...
Now's your chance!
Finish him off!
Oh, come on!
Just when we got to the juicy part!
Who is there?
What do you want?
I do not know... this is really awkward!
That must be it.
So, what are you doing here?
If you came to see Belldandy, she went out with Keiichi.
Well, it is not terribly important, but I think I will wait until she comes back.
So you came here to try to sniff out our dark secrets again?
What do you mean, secrets?
Of course not!
You are really a piece of work, going to all this trouble to be campus queen.
Excuse me, but did not you enter the contest to vie for the title yourself?
You two looked so desperate to own that title...
I am sorry you did not realize that!
Who are you to talk, when you are the one who lost to Belldandy?
If I recall, was not it you who lost to Belldandy?
Those kids are not old enough to appreciate a mature woman's splendor!
I guess your breast size was just right for them.
What does that have to do with it?
My breasts are not small, either!
I thought you dressed yourself in layers because you were insecure about them.
If you keep wearing those revealing dresses, you will only damage your skin!
But that is better than not turning any heads.
You are just an exhibitionist, are not you?
Flat-chested!
Flasher!
Listen, why do not we turn on the TV?
Oh, good idea.
There is a show I want to watch now.
Well, let me turn it on for you.
Oh?
Well, thanks.
Well, let me turn it on for you.
Channel 6!
Channel 6!
All right.
KING OF ENKA 2-hour special
Why, you...
Now you know!
I will be taking this CD with me, all right?
Not that...
Do not tell me you are in league with that demon...
Good night...
How did it go?
Here.
Is this all right?
Looks like you came up big for me, eh?
Of course.
I am most grateful to you for granting my wish.
All right, it is my turn.
You have got to hold up your end of the bargain now.
I have already started the wheels turning.
What is that?
This is the Balance Sphere for Keiichi Morisato's heart.
Keiichi's heart?
That is right.
The human heart is a fragile thing.
Once thrown off balance, he will not hear the goddess's voice anymore.
Oh, come on!
Do not tell me you are a goddess, too...
No... a devil.
That is what I am.
Well, it does not matter to me what you are as long as...
Just leave it to me.
Now, we have a contract.
Put your hand on this Balance Sphere.
Now Keiichi's heart is mired in my spell!
Just one more push, and his heart will be tipped towards you, just as you wish.
Just as I wish?
I have no feeling for Keiichi!
But if the end result is that Belldandy disappears, what do you care?
That guy is just a means to the end.
But of course he is!
I am only using Keiichi Morisato to banish Belldandy once and for all!
Now all you have to do is meet up with those two.
But that is easier said than done!
Where in the world are they?
Have no fear.
The wheels of Fate have already begun to turn.
It is inevitable now that you will encounter them.
Boy, it sure feels good to be outside!
I am so glad that we decided to go out!
Me, too.
I am so glad that we decided to go out!
Huh?
Is there something on my face?
No, it is not that...
I was thinking that it is been a long time since...
Uh... is that right?
Yes, not since Urd came to stay with us...
Right, things were pretty hectic for a while.
Yes.
That is why I am so grateful to you, Keiichi.
Grateful?
Thank you so much for taking a walk with me!
Really!
What is up with her, anyway?
Talking about Fate and all that stuff...
No way am I going to be able to find those two so easily!
And besides, what am I supposed to do once I find them?
She left out all the important details!
All right, then, since it is still early in the day, let us go have a good time!
All right!
Huh?
Huh?
The rest is up to you, Sayoko.
I really did run into them!
Hello!
What a coincidence, running into each other like this here!
Yes, it certainly is a coincidence.
What are you two doing?
I am going to take a walk around the city with Keiichi.
Oh, I see.
I do not see how this is going to be of any help!
It is such a nice day.
We have not gone out in so long, so as a change of pace...
That is right.
In your heart you only have eyes for the woman standing right in front of you!
Is something wrong, Keiichi?
Do you have a fever or something?
Huh?
No, it is nothing.
But you are not feeling well...
We would better go home right away.
We would better go home right away.
What is going on?
We can go for a walk some other time.
Everything's just as it always is.
We can go for a walk some other time.
Sorry to bother you.
I am going now.
Listen, if you would like, why do not you come with us?
But you two are on a date, are not you?
I will not do anything lame like get in your way.
The three of us can hang out together, right, Belldandy?
Yes.
We were just thinking of where we could go have a good time.
If you have a place in mind, would you take us there?
I have no idea what is come over you, but I will keep you company.
I wonder what is up with Keiichi?
What do you mean?
Have not you ever been to a club before?
Well, I do not usually come to places like these.
Then I am amazed you even had the nerve to ask me out!
That is it, that is it, that is it!
What on earth have you been doing for fun?
Whatever it is, it is not going to get you a lot of dates.
Oh, well...
Keiichi?
I think I will dance, too.
So you are going to challenge me on this dance floor?
I will not lose to you!
Could you teach me how to do that?
If I could dance like you, I bet I would have a lot more fun here!
As long as you have talent, I would be happy to show you some moves.
Is something wrong?
You do not look too good.
Oh, no...
I am fine, really.
Then maybe you are not having a good time hanging out with me?
I will hang out with Sayoko a while longer.
Why do not you go on home and get some rest?
The goddess's love can no longer reach that guy.
All right.
If that is what you want, Keiichi, I will go home now and get some rest.
Excuse me.
Hey, are you okay with this?
No...
Keiichi...
Can it be that you no longer need me?
Victory is mine now!
The goddesses will soon be gone...
And the demons will reign with this Earth as our fortress!
KING OF ENKA 2-hour special THE END
Next, here is the latest news.
This morning in Nekomi Prefecture...
How dare she subject me to enka... that woman is the devil incarnate!
If she took that CD, that means Marller must be behind all this.
This is going to be a pain in the...
Huh?
Aha!
What is the matter?
You do not look happy.
I was thinking what a great time we had.
I had a good time, too.
I was thinking what a great time we had.
I wish she was not scared off so easily...
I was hoping for more competition.
Not that I ever actually considered her to be a true rival, anyway...
Oh, I am sorry.
Oh, hey, do not worry about it.
Are you ready to order?
Let us see, what should I get?
Two Darjeeling teas, please.
But I have not told you what I wanted!
Sorry.
But listen, it is good, so just give it a try.
All right.
Bring us two of those, then.
Very well.
You were thinking about Belldandy just now, were not you?
No, of course not!
Really, now?
You are the one I want to be with right now, Sayoko.
No, that is not true.
It is not you who I want to be with.
Here is your tea...
You know what... this really is not for me.
Really?
Belldandy said she liked it.
It is her favorite kind of tea.
Impossible!
Why are you bringing her up?
You just told me that you wanted to be with me!
I cannot believe how insensitive you are!
Sorry.
I have had enough.
I am sorry!
It is my fault.
Telling me you were having a good time with me... you are full of sweet talk!
But at the end of the day, you only have Belldandy on your mind!
That is not true.
I will take you to dinner to make it up to you.
Are you taking me to a restaurant that meets my standards?
Belldandy's such a terrific cook, so let us go to my place for dinner...
Are you trying to insult me?
Then, let us go look at the ocean!
You said you loved to listen to the sound of the wind, right?
No way!
A beach with a beautiful view of the sunset... that is what I like!
I do not remember ever saying that I liked listening to the wind!
Sayoko...
If you are going to lie to me, then do me a favor and lie all the way!
I am not lying to you...
For god's sake!
I will never know what Belldandy sees in this moron.
Belldandy?
That is right...
Belldandy's the one I...
Tell Belldandy for me...
Even if I am rid of Belldandy, it is not going to make me any happier.
What a fool!
Throwing away such a golden opportunity!
However!
I have the CD in my possession.
As long as I have this, those goddesses are nothing to fear.
Hi, Marller!
Are you watching?
Urd!
Hi, Marller!
Are you watching?
Urd!
I will find you, so you would better brace yourself!
Spirit of Electricity, Spirit of the Radio Waves, Spirit of Television...
Heed my call and meld all minds into one.
Channel...
Rock!
What the hell?
Not that!
That is right, it is Belldandy!
There you are!
No... damn that Urd!
Taking advantage of the fact that I cannot stop dancing when I hear rock music!
You devil!
Excuse me, but are not you the devil here?
Now that I have recovered this thing...
No good, she is not home.
Is she out somewhere?
Now where would Belldandy go?
What should I do now?
If Keiichi no longer wishes to have me by his side, then I have no choice...
But that is not it...
I thought I was staying here to fulfill my job as a goddess, but now...
Keiichi...
I want to be by your side.
Belldandy!
Keiichi!
Wait, do not go!
How did you know I would be here?
'Where the wind crossing the vast ocean...'
'...meets the wind that has descended from the mountains.'
You said it was your favorite place to be, remember?
I am sorry I was such a jerk to you before, but I was wrong...
I only want to be with one person... and that is you.
Keiichi!
So please, do not ever leave me.
I want you to stay by my side forever!
Then you mean it is all right to stay by your side, Keiichi?
It is all right to fulfill our contract, then?
The contract has nothing to do with this.
I am not talking about goddesses or contracts...
All I want... is for you to stay with me.
Keiichi!
What do I care about that girl?
Someday I am going to defeat Belldandy without help from anybody!
And when I do, I will win him over, too...
One day when I woke up...
A day like any other... another one just beginning.
There you are, yawning... your face is still so sleepy.
Because each peaceful day we share is a miracle to me.
This is where my heart will always return...
Forever...
There is only one thing I wish for.
I chase after the same dream, wherever it may go.
The love I feel for you gives me strength.
May tomorrow be as joyful as today...
That is my wish...
It was not only joy that the goddess bestowed upon this earth.
Who has emerged from the distortion in time along with these system bugs?
Next episode: Ah! Who Does Big Sister Belong To?
Do not tell me I have got a rival now!
